bcl:section.bcl:marginalnote: Access to statements by electronic means
bcl:section.bcl:text: For the purpose of section 92 (1) of the Act, a credit grantor may give a statement of account to a borrower by providing access to a copy of the statement by electronic means if

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: when access is provided, the credit grantor provides the borrower with notice by electronic means that the statement is available, and
